alert.note: Alert for Kittson; Marshall; Roseau (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 1:50PM CDT until June 24 at 2:30PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Marshall County in northwestern Minnesota... Southeastern Kittson County in northwestern Minnesota... Southwestern Roseau County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 230 PM CDT. * At 150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Old Mill State Park, or 26 miles northwest of Thief River Falls, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Strandquist and Karlstad. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
